setting.location: Powi≈õle district by Vistula River, impoverished area with crowded tenements and narrow muddy streets
setting.weather: Cold autumn evening with mist rising from the river

characters.appearance: Middle-aged man, 40s, well-dressed but walking carefully through rough neighborhood, concerned expression
characters.clothing: Dark overcoat and hat, leather gloves, walking stick, clothes marking him as outsider from better district
characters.position: Walking cautiously along muddy street between ramshackle buildings
characters.action: Observing poverty around him with mixture of shock and determination, occasionally stopping to help struggling residents

characters.appearance: Working-class man, 30s, powerful build, clothes stained with labor, weathered hands and face
characters.clothing: Rough wool jacket with patches, thick boots, cloth cap, leather apron showing craft work
characters.position: Emerging from basement workshop carrying heavy tools
characters.action: Pausing to nod respectfully to the well-dressed visitor, wiping sweat from brow

scene.mainElements: Narrow cobblestone streets with deep puddles, multi-story tenement buildings with laundry hanging from windows, basement workshops with forge fires glowing, river mist in background
scene.details: Children playing in muddy streets despite cold, women carrying water buckets and bundles of washing, men gathered around small fires for warmth, wooden stairs leading to cramped upper floors, smoke rising from numerous chimneys, smell of forge work and river dampness, sounds of hammering and working from basement shops
scene.background: Vistula River visible in distance with cargo boats, bridge connecting to better parts of city, factory smokestacks on horizon
scene.atmosphere: Harsh reality of working-class life contrasted with visitor's comfortable world, dignity maintained despite poverty, sense of hidden Warsaw beneath elegant surface, no text or letters visible

composition.cameraAngle: Wide shot showing the contrast between well-dressed visitor and rough neighborhood
composition.focus: The interaction between different social worlds meeting on these streets
composition.depth: Foreground: muddy street and working people, middle: the visiting gentleman, background: river and industrial landscape
